examples.example: 我们要随时保持积极乐观的心态去面对生活中的挑战。

translate.english: We should always keep a positive and optimistic attitude to face the challenges in life.

examples.example: 我们应该随时准备好迎接新的机遇和挑战。

translate.english: We should always be ready to meet new opportunities and challenges.

examples.example: 我们应该随时提升自己，以更好地适应社会的发展。

translate.english: We should improve ourselves at any time to better adapt to the development of society.
